name: Super Beast Hunt (itch)
description:
Super Beast Hunt is a silly little 2D platformer about a Demon who wants to eat Meat!

The land of Isle Historia is facing a strange crisis! A Meat shortage plagues the island, and without the help of its guardian, no-one can hunt the dangerous Beasts and retrieve the Meat everyone deserves. Luckily, a Demon known as Merry turns up. She's an excellent Beast Hunter, and she's also very hungry.

-20 Stages + 4 Secret stages, spread across 5 vastly different worlds. They can get quite tricky, watch out!

-5 difficult challenges for Super players, hosted by a Bunny of course.

-A simple yet versatile moveset to traverse the many stages with.

-Different spells to shoot at Beasts.

-3 funny female protagonists!

-A crazy variety of Beasts to jump on, attack, defeat and get attacked by.

-A wild story with a twist or two.

-A silly cast of characters including a Moth-person, a girl who lives inside a TV and even a Skeleton!

-Room customisation. It serves no purpose but it's there anyway.

Developed by woah_maaan

Music by melon_mungus
